name: jukebox
description: LAN YouTube Jukebox - Share and play YouTube videos at LAN parties

scripts.build:win: pkg server.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/lan-jukebox.exe && pkg generate-password.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/generate-password.exe && cp config.example.json dist/ && cp README-WINDOWS.txt dist/README.txt && cp -r public dist/
scripts.build:all: pkg server.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output dist/lan-jukebox && pkg generate-password.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64,node18-macos-x64 --output dist/generate-password && cp config.example.json dist/ && cp README-WINDOWS.txt dist/README.txt && cp -r public dist/
